title: Sun Microsystems - Wikipedia
snippet: Sun contributed significantly to the evolution of several key computing technologies, among them Unix, RISC processors, thin client computing, and virtualized computing. title: Sun Microsystems Inc, 2550 Garcia Ave, Mountain View, CA 94043, US - MapQuest
snippet: Sun Microsystems Inc, headquartered in Mountain View, California, was a prominent technology company known for its development of computer hardware and software, particularly in the UNIX operating system space.

title: Sun Microsystems Information
snippet: Sun Microsystems is an IT Services and IT Consulting, Custom Software & Technical Consulting, and Business/Productivity Software company located in Palo Alto, California with $55.8 billion in revenue and 5,073 employees.
